messages.content:
Found the issue! The script calculates repo_root as
  Path(__file__).resolve().parent.parent.parent.parent which would be:

  .coditect/scripts/export-dedup.py → parent (scripts) → parent (.coditect)
  → parent (coditect-core-dotclaude) → parent (core) - this results in
  submodules/core not the actual repo root.

  Since .coditect is symlinked, the path resolution is wrong. The script is
  looking at submodules as the repo root because the symlink chain leads
  there.

  Let me trace the actual path:
messages.content_preview:
Found the issue! The script calculates repo_root as
  Path(__file__).resolve().parent.parent.parent.parent which would be:

  .coditect/scripts/export-dedup.py → parent (scripts) → parent (.coditect)
...
